page.title: 02SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: Although Tomintoul is a very small village there are quite a lot of sports facilities available locally. In the winter there is skiing at the Lecht which is about 7 miles away.There is also a Rifle Club, a Badminton Club, and an Indoor Bowling Club available in the village halls. The summer offers a wide range of outdoor activities for all the family.This includes grouse shooting,deer stalking,clay pigeon shooting,hill-walking,tennis and pony trekking.Also there is fishing in the River Avon and the Conglass Water.The Avon has mostly salmon and the Conglass mostly small trout.You need a permit for the Avon but not for the Conglass.For such a small village Tomintoul has got quite a lot to offer people interested in sport.
